Starstomp:
Okay. Good luck, Nightlight! Windlord, we need to coordinate our attacks, 
take the right head, I'll get the left. This could confuse it.

She ignited her jet back and took out her two Stardust sabers. She went full 
speed towards the left head of the Gemini Dragon.
